description: A collection of circles in a two distinct formations: the larger formation is shaped like a lowercase, serif-font t; above it is a small, triangular formation. There are also several separate circles to the left of the triangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a very long, very thin orange triangle extending from the grouping of circles to the left of the triangular formation down to the left of the t-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
